website_summaries.verdict: No-nonsense hand grips ideal for buyers seeking an inexpensive product without sacrificing functionality.
pros: Remarkably affordable price for excellent function
Customers remark on the comfortable padding offered in the grip
cons: A few buyers complained that the square hole shape made fingers slide around in glove

customer_reviews.title: Nice grips...sizing chart off slightly for medium
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet in the gym but they do seem of really high quality...especially for the price. Be aware though (and this is why I am docking a point) the sizing chart is slightly off on the picture. A medium it says is 3.5-4.75 inches (which both my wife and I fit in this range). The packaging for the medium though says 4-4.75. I was just over 4 but my wife was just under. They still worked but want people to know the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce pain in hand callus
customer_reviews.text: Pull ups, deadlifts, and barbell rows were incredibly painful before getting these. It was difficult to get the most out of those lift because my hands would be in agony before the muscles and my grip strength could benefit from the movement. These help. I can continue doing those lifts now without my calluses ruining it for me.
customer_reviews.author: AA2010

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality and price but aren't crazy about using ...
customer_reviews.text: I find that the holes for the fingers are a little large. Also, when doing pull ups, the grips need to be folded a little to provide protection. I did not know this was how it should be used until my trainer told me. It is well made and as described. I like the quality and price but aren't crazy about using these for my Crossfit needs.
customer_reviews.author: Traci R

customer_reviews.title: These gloves have a big wholes for my small fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have a big wholes for my small fingers and that leaves me with no protection on the bar....( If you have a small hands these are not for you....( They are well made .
customer_reviews.author: kate pacana

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a couple of days now and have to say this is very good for the hands. I normally workout with 45 lb kettle bell and the calluses I was getting bare hand was hampering my workout. This leather strap has helped me focus on my workout and not on the hand placement which was just a bad accident waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grips!
customer_reviews.text: Late on the review but these things are awesome. This is my second set (prior brand first time) and these grips are a quality pad AND they hold chalk well...I don't need to reapply chalk when doing large sets of pull-ups, toes to bar, muscle-ups whatever. Best ones I've used. Use multiple times per week and they are very durable. Another very nice touch is that the Velcro strap around your wrist is long enough where you don't have to completely unravel the strap to get on and off...just makes them easy and quick to throw on and off. Best I've ever seen/used.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Day

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if these are the best youth grips
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to use on the gymnastics bar. The finger holes are rectangular shaped and pretty big so they slide when she tries to use them, exposing the skin that she is trying to protect with these grips. Also, the cut of the leather for the finger holes is cut at a slight angle, so it almost has a sharp edge that digs into her painfully when she tries to use them. Might try to trim that off with a razor blade, but hate to do that with an almost new item. Don't know how much use we'll be getting out of these.
customer_reviews.author: BLR

customer_reviews.title: good product and seller
customer_reviews.text: The first pair i received had a buckle come off after a few months. I emailed the seller and they said that was not how their product should perform and sent a replacement immediately--within 3 days I think-- no questions asked. This replacement lasted over 2 years and now, and that's with about 3-5x/week use. I just bought my third pair.
customer_reviews.author: sfm

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I just started doing CrossFit and it's hard enough to keep up and learn proper form without having to worry about the flesh tearing off of my palms. I didn't even think my hands were that soft, but after one day of practicing pull-ups and lifting my palms were sore, blistering, and then peeling for days. I'm sure if I pushed through it I'd just develop thick, scratchy callouses that would only bleed occasionally -- yeah, no thanks. I used these for the first time during a conditioning session this week and they saved my hands and, I think, my commitment to this gym membership. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kdubba

customer_reviews.title: A must have pair of wod gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price point for a pair of gloves that finally were comfortable! After buying some popular brands that were recommended these were the hidden gems found. Come to find out they’re pretty popular, too!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. McAlpin

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job for now!
customer_reviews.text: I can imagine that these will not last forever, but for the 2 months I've been using them, they are serving the purpose and are holding up. For the price, that's all I can ask for. Fit doesn't bother me either so I'll circle back once they finally do give up.
customer_reviews.author: Philana Thackston

customer_reviews.title: and so far so good. They definitely have help protect my palms from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of handgrips I've ever purchased, and so far so good. They definitely have help protect my palms from against the bar and there long enough so when I need to transition the exercises I can just pull them up and I have my fingers and not have to take them all away off so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: mrskriston

customer_reviews.title: The quality is as good, or better
customer_reviews.text: The price on these is significantly lower than the other's i have ordered grips from on amazon. The quality is as good, or better. I am an avid cross -fitter (5 or 6 workouts a week) and they seem to be holding up well. I will be ordering a few extra pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Biagi

customer_reviews.title: Very good grip however the Velcro is not sewed very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good grip however the Velcro is not sewed very well to the straps so it came off after a couple of months. I fixed it myself but then the plastic piece came lose and I had lost it so I will have to get a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar E. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Have gotten two pairs
customer_reviews.text: They do last a long time. Helped me not rip my hands so much.
customer_reviews.author: D22

customer_reviews.title: Great !!! For bar work
customer_reviews.text: These work great ... I had purchased a pair like these from another brand and I kept slipping from the bar. I used these for a competition and my hands were great... Minor tears but that was due to the amount of toes to bars. I recommend them to everyone I know at my gym. Super satisfied. Once you get use to them your grip will definitely improve. I'm one who doesn't get sold on stuff or write reviews, but these grips saved my hands ! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I WILL continue to buy these grips!
customer_reviews.text: Great for Crossfit! They work really well on Speal bars! I really haven’t tried them on anything other than a Speal bar so I can’t say how they are overall. From what I have experienced they are very grippy. I have ripped a few grips, BUT I am really hard on them, and they did last around 6 months both times I ripped them. I will continue to buy these grips!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much needed addition to my training.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would not need it after acquiring my gymnastic rings but oh was I wrong. Some blisters and corns later I use them all the time. Makes my training so much easier and more efficient. Material is very tough and rugged and cushions my palms effectively. Wrist wrap actually helps with additional stabilization for wrists during movements.
customer_reviews.author: Xan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. I needed something to protect my hands during kipping pullups, muscle ups, and toes to bar, and these worked perfectly! Bit of advised, though, make sure you chalk them up. While the leather allows for amazing grip, it doesn't allow the hands to roll on the pull up bar for kipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Crossfit bar work
customer_reviews.text: Grate for Crossfit bar work. I have used Wodies and more expensive palm grips, I prefer these basic 2 finger grips, the square finger holes seem to work better than the round finger holes, the leather comes right up to the crease between my palm and ring&middle finger, no more tears, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't solve problem of palm tears.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like these but during 3rd round of 5 bar muscle ups I ripped both palms while wearing. Fabric itself didn't tear but my skin did, costing me a week out of the gym.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because I was tired of ripping my calluses and hands open during kettlebell training. Bought on the advice of a trainer. Great product for the price. Does the job well. Still had some irritation from the leather rubbing against my hands but I think that should subside after more use, either way nowhere near as bad as the damage I would do when just using chalk. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Gordon

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut out the finger holes some to get them on
customer_reviews.author: Darren C

customer_reviews.title: ... them and tried to do kipping pull-ups they felt super uncomfortable so I had to take them off
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I have to break them down or something but when I first wore them and tried to do kipping pull-ups they felt super uncomfortable so I had to take them off. I am not sure maybe with use they will feel better on my hands - it bothered my hands between the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: AdrianaWar

customer_reviews.title: ... them and that helped them mold to my hands better. I like them a lot now
customer_reviews.text: at first I didn't think these were going to work but then I got the advice to wet them and that helped them mold to my hands better. I like them a lot now!
customer_reviews.author: OmahaRedHead

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing 6 months for crossfit. I only go 2-4 days a week and only use them maybe once a week, but going on 6 months and still in acceptable shape. The wrist Velcro feels cheap and could see it running/hurting, but so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_user_

customer_reviews.title: Best grips for all lifts
customer_reviews.text: I've used other grips just like this but this one is a lot better. 1. Real leather 2. Wrist wrap is solid and durable. Get a smaller size so there is little space between the bottom of the wrist and palm.
customer_reviews.author: FlexArms

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT!! Exactly what my hands needed- no more tares or pain when lifting! Used these this morning at crossfit doing deadlifts at 85%. Wonderful customer service from the owner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emger2007

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've used these twice since receiving them. No problems so far. It will take some time and use to break the leather in fully and it does leave a white film on clothes at the beginning, just like any other grips. That will stop over time. For the price, these are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, protected my hands. The first time I used them was for a workout that involved toes to bars. And for the first time ever, I was able to do toes to bars for the entire workout instead of switching over to hanging knee raises partway through, Coincidence? Maybe. :-) But not taking any chances and will definitely be using for any relevant movements going forward. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done. Fast shipping and the best friendliest customer service you could ask for. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: These hand grips work great for me and enable me to do more pullups ...
customer_reviews.text: If you do a lot of pull ups, these grips will definitely save your hands. Regular gloves at least in my case always rip. These hand grips work great for me and enable me to do more pullups without ripping the callouses on my hands. LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality good fit I think I ordered too big ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality good fit I think I ordered too big for me but have molded to my fingers these past two days...thank you for a great product! I'll be shopping this brand often!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The first time wearing felt different while lifting weights, but the 2nd time they were barely noticeable. Great product you will love them!!
customer_reviews.author: SharonH

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've used other grips with varying degrees of success, but these so far seem to do a great job with whatever gymnastics work I'm doing. So far, so good. I've had them for about 2 weeks now and have used them about 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Six21 Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cross Fit
customer_reviews.text: Got the leather hand grips for my daughter in law who does a lot of weight lifting and bar pull ups for cross fit. She loves them! The grips have been great in helping her to excel at cross fit and meeting goals.
customer_reviews.author: morecoffee

customer_reviews.title: No more torn callouses!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing Crossfit for two years, and recently I came home with three callouses torn from my hand. My sister in law told me about the 321 Hand Grips. I have worn them three times, and really like them. I don't even notice that they are on my hands. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy and have held up with no rips or tears in the grips or my hands. My only wish is that the Velcro strap around the wrist was a better less stiff material and perhaps a little wider. But I do recommend these to anyone who wants to preserve their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Customer

customer_reviews.title: worn out after a while......
customer_reviews.text: these seemed a little big for me, and they get kinda worn out after a month, I used these on the uneven bars and the holes where your fingers go through got a little stretched.
customer_reviews.author: whomestead

customer_reviews.title: They’re great for grip
customer_reviews.text: For the most part they protect hands and the grip is great. The plastic part for adjusting does bother me a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: I'm sad I ended up losing my pair
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad I ended up losing my pair, but when I did have them I was able to save my hands from tearing. Over time, the leather naturally will stretch, but not too much. It's very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Ray L

customer_reviews.title: These are better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are better than advertised. I am currently using them with pull ups, deadliest and kettle bell swing. Great company, great customer service. I would not hesitate to prefer from them or their catalog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the grips and can actually do TTB much easier
customer_reviews.text: Love the grips and can actually do TTB much easier! Add wrist support at this cost and you'll have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Surprises! Nice Seller!!
customer_reviews.text: HI - I haven't had the chance to use these yet, but they fit, look exactly as pictured and arrived on time - did I mention the really great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: rooseveltq

customer_reviews.title: Simple design and pretty comfortable. I really like that you can take ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple design and pretty comfortable. I really like that you can take the finger portion off quickly to do other exercises. You can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: christina yarber

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product... great price.. Comes with awesome carrying/storage case. Fit perfect! Comfortable on my hands and protected my palms and allowed me to work out longer and harder without the pain of sore hands from pull ups and dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Cozine

customer_reviews.title: I like the product. I love the service!
customer_reviews.text: Great price on nice quality grips. Also, really impressive customer support for a $12 product!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised, but not for long.
customer_reviews.text: The grips worked as advertised, but lasted only 2 weeks of mild use before the stitching came undone on one of the grips. Unfortunately for me this happened 1 day outside the 30 day warranty period. I would have expected more out of such a highly rated product. I would suggest trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie S.

customer_reviews.title: but the measurement on the small sounded like it would have been too small
customer_reviews.text: They are too big, but the measurement on the small sounded like it would have been too small. The palm of my hand measured 4", so I went with the medium which was 4-4.75" and the small was 3.75". Small probably would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and rough on the hands
customer_reviews.text: Rough on the hands, fell apart early but somewhat functional
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The grips are fantastic! They are made well and have held up ...
customer_reviews.text: The grips are fantastic! They are made well and have held up to Crossfit workouts and competitions. I don't think their is a finer product out there for the price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... who is 6'3 250 and he says they work great!!
customer_reviews.text: got these for my husband who is 6'3 250 and he says they work great!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner, and so far they are excellent. I purchased them to work on my bar muscle ups, as I had tears that would happen in my skill work which would then delay me until I healed up. In using them, it has eliminated that problem. Now I just need to get up over the bar! Thanks for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gambill

customer_reviews.title: But the material is good quality. I don't feel like I'm slipping when ...
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands, so the holes for my fingers were too big even though I got the smallest size. But the material is good quality. I don't feel like I'm slipping when I hang on the bar. The parts of my hands that are covered don't rip.
customer_reviews.author: R V.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female with a size 4" hands. I'm a crossfitter and I got the point where I was tired of my hands ripping. I was hesitant on the size between a small and medium when I looked up hand grips and finally settled for a medium. When I tried them on they happen to fit big but once I tried them out they were a perfect fit and protected my hands they way should. I highly recommend 321 hand grips
customer_reviews.author: janei

customer_reviews.title: Great Grips for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: Great price point - using these weekly in workouts. Very durable and long lasting. Just bought a backup pair.
customer_reviews.author: RyeReelFish'n

customer_reviews.title: They are great for bar work - pull-ups
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these grips. They are great for bar work - pull-ups, muscle ups, toes to bar... he says he feels almost like he's cheating because they make his movements feel so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: momma smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for grip in exercises like toes to bar
customer_reviews.text: Great for grip in exercises like toes to bar, however, found the holes for the fingers too widewhich led to your hand being a little exposed to the friction in repetitions. If you do lot of repetitions with these, the upper part in the palm of your hand might get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will tear!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be great but as you can see they were a bust literally and only after less than 5 times used.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Corsiatto

customer_reviews.title: they get the job done. it would have been ...
customer_reviews.text: they get the job done. it would have been 5 stars if they used a softer hook/loop material. the current one's edges cut.
customer_reviews.author: Sarav

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No wrist support whatsoever, I would not use these for lifting barbells, dumbbells or kettlebells as described.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These hand grips are excellent! First pair I've owned but so far they have held up very well and certainly saving my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel techy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit pretty well. I've only used them once. Nice Velcro wrist strap. Holds hen securely.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Get small size
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. I ordered the wrong size. Should have gotten smalls. Mediums bunch up with the stretching, also because of the wrong size the finger holes leave a big gap between my hand and the leather. The wrist straps are to long on me. To get them tight enough the plastic loop doesn't sit on my wrist comfortablly. The bag is handy, the leather is thick, and my grip is stronger using them. Get a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Cnhelsea Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: The hand grips are really good but the finger holes are little bit small but ...
customer_reviews.text: The hand grips are really good but the finger holes are little bit small but over all it is veryy good product.
customer_reviews.author: ej dela cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great palm protection for those gruesome bar workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I just started my CrossFit journey and my palms were killing me. These palm protectors really helped. They won't relieve all of the friction from the pull up bars on your hands but they definitely provide a nice barrier. They work great for bar work (weights). I even use them as I do burpees and push-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great, they are already pretty soft out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great, they are already pretty soft out of the package. They fit great and provide just enough hand coverage to prevent rips. They are not too thick but seem durable enough to withstand the rigors of pullups and muscle ups.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Krzywonos

customer_reviews.title: It'll still work fine but I fear that these won't hold up for ...
customer_reviews.text: The piece that sits between your fingers tore on mine only 50 pullups into using it. It'll still work fine but I fear that these won't hold up for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: I’m sorry but i didn’t like these at all
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry but i didn’t like these at all. They were very stiff around the finger holes and i think a size too big although i ordered a small. It was rough for me to grip the pull-up bar and the finger holes rubbed against my skin too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Daines

customer_reviews.title: easy to wear and take off
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for o do toes to bar and pull ups! non-slip, secure grip, easy to wear and take off. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tania R. Galinanes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very much protects the hands- even with previously ripped callouses.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Great for crossfit
customer_reviews.text: Great product - much better than the gloves I was using. I use these for crossfit. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove...
customer_reviews.text: Just what you think it is...works like a charm; save your grip.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kramer

customer_reviews.title: So far these seem very sturdy and have protected my hands without feeling so thick ...
customer_reviews.text: I do Crossfit so a lot of time doing gymnastics movements means I need grips that will hold up! So far these seem very sturdy and have protected my hands without feeling so thick that I can't grip the bar. Can't wait to see how they do when I really have them broken in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the holes you have to put your fingers through.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAndra K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They don’t cover my calluses and they hurt. I can’t use them at all. i had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: ktw7

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: These just don't work for me. They bunch up and the grip isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: They fit awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for kipping pull-ups because I was sick of tearing my hands. They fit awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grips
customer_reviews.text: Great grips that hold up well and last for a good price! thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jivor50

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the BUCK!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! it works just as great as the "brand" names for 3x the cost at your local sporting good stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They work great. With no grips my hands usually get torn up to the point of bleeding. The 321 grips are well made and can take a lot of abuse. I will be buying more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: tyler tibbitts

customer_reviews.title: Great for Enhanced grip
customer_reviews.text: Thin leather allows for enhanced grip function on these grips. Affordabble and strong. This is my second pair, and will surelly buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Franco E

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the hand grips tore at the finger section after about 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: after 1 month of use it broke almost fall doing pull ups!
customer_reviews.author: Nini34

customer_reviews.title: The wrist straps rub and are uncomfortable. It also ...
customer_reviews.text: The wrist straps rub and are uncomfortable. It also rubs on the finger holes and creates little blisters on my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as suspected and keeps my hands protected when doing pull ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hand saver!
customer_reviews.text: Good hand coverage, I haven't ripped my hands since I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Stark

customer_reviews.title: They were ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them, because they were to big, only negative thing and that's why I give 4 stars is that I have to pay for returning this item
customer_reviews.author: YR

customer_reviews.title: Hand Saver. Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product really saved my hands during my workout. The hand grips didn't hinder any of my lifts either. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mavkang

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair for my wife and I to use... and they made a world of a difference! Wife was really grateful and my hands appreciated it too. And, well happy wife happy life.
customer_reviews.author: The Nasty’s

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the wrong size emailed the company and received a reply within an hour. New pair arrived within a couple of days. Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, sizing is right on with how they say to measure, no more ripped up hands!
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: I was at the max for the small size and seems like they may be too tight but thinking they'll stretch ...
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to using these. I was at the max for the small size and seems like they may be too tight but thinking they'll stretch out more from use. The leather seems like it will protect my hands though.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Pegram

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great price
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair for a year and a half and they are still going strong. No signs of tearing and I use them 3-5 times/week with intense CrossFit/gymnastics workouts. Bought these for my wife because of it and the price is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Torsten Waurig

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. The palm protectors are made with really good leather. They also follow up with you personally to make sure that you are satisfied with your product.
customer_reviews.author: Holder

customer_reviews.title: Took out of the package today to use for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Took out of the package today to use for the first time during 17.2 and after my first set of muscle up the leather grip ripped right through the center, this caused me to tear due to the fact that I had no more protection and a lot more muscle ups and T2B's to go, am going to try and return and purchase the Victory Grips
customer_reviews.author: Donna A. Rineer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with these grips
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these grips. I use them to protect my hands when doing pull-ups and other bar exercises which are part of my workout. They help keep my hands from tearing and are easy to slip out of when switching to other exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a shot for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for about 3 weeks now, and they have been great. I would say I have done about 10 grip heavy workouts and have had no issues so far. Definitely worth a shot for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Hill

customer_reviews.title: 321..Go..Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and these are really performing well for CrossFit! Just did a 100 pu workout and they hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great straps, very comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Great straps, very comfortable to use, fast shipping and great customer service. Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Serge Que
